title: What you can download
text:
Home » technology » What you can download What you can download September 30, 2015 12:45 pm 
Fixzy 
Blue Jeans Blue Jeans Blue Jeans makes business-quality video conferencing easy, accessible and affordable. The Blue Jeans app works with the Blue Jeans service to provide true universal, multi-party video calls on the go with a variety of video conference systems such as Polycom, Cisco, LifeSize, Tely and Microsoft Lync. With the Blue Jeans app, users can host or join video conferences from anywhere. Blue Jeans helps businesses of all sizes have productive and engaging meetings without the hassle or expense of dedicated hardware. Fixzy When you have anything that needs to get fixed, think of Fixzy. This application will help you to easily get things fixed, mended or repaired. The Fixzy is a mobile app working with its web directory collecting all kinds of technicians - including electricians, home handymen, engineers, and mechanics to serve you when you need assistance. Users just download the app and register, then once they need help just open the app. LINE@ LINE@ lets you create business accounts to communicate with customers. LINE@ facilitates your communicating with customers via broadcast messages, one-on-one chats, and Timeline posts. Any LINE user can create an account for free. The beauty is that it allows you to send messages to all LINE users who add your LINE@ account as a friend. You can use 1-on-1 chats with customers and set up auto replies when you’re unavailable as well as to post on the Timeline; and to promote detailed business info on your account page. 103 Viewed
